synopsis.text:
So aked in the throes of adolescence, 16-year-old Keisuke Saji finds himself head over heels for the enigmatic Koizumi Akira, despite her blatant disdain for men and his relentless advances. Saji's persistence is unyielding, even when faced with Koizumi's aggressive rejections, fueled by his teenage fantasies and unwavering determination to win her heart.

Complicating matters further is Saji's childhood friend, the well-endowed Yuki, who harbors feelings for him and sees Koizumi as a rival. As Saji navigates this tangled web of teenage hormones and unrequited love, he remains steadfast in his pursuit of Koizumi.

Will Saji's unyielding determination pay off, or will Koizumi's aversion to men keep them apart forever? And what role will Yuki play in this unfolding love triangle? Only time will tell in this comedic tale of adolescent love and longing.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
